name: Rhythm Cat
description:
2019 Epic Mega Jam

Team Name : DJam

Gameplay Instructions

There are many stray cats in space, save them with your love! This is an amazing project, VR multiplayer co-op rhythm game, almost out of nothing, only completed in 7 days! 

 Support : Oculus, VIVE, Windows Mixed Reality

Control: VR headset, motion controller

Platform : Windows
